title: install qt failed
body:
Don't know what causes this...
```
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    './configure' '-no-eglfs' '-no-directfb' '-no-gtk' '-prefix' '/home/hueyke/sources/spack/opt/spack/linux-linuxmint18-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/qt-5.7.0-tw56l4sxwyisggyuie5nx5bg37zk4q3l' '-v' '-opensource' '-opengl' '-release' '-shared' '-confirm-license' '-openssl-linked' '-optimized-qmake' '-no-openvg' '-no-pch' '-no-nis' '-nomake' 'examples' '-no-dbus' '-qt-xcb' '-skip' 'webengine'
/home/hueyke/sources/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/qt/package.py:277, in configure:
     260      @when('@5.7:')
     261      def configure(self):
     262          config_args = self.common_config_args
     263  
     264          if not sys.platform == 'darwin':
     265              config_args.extend([
     266                  '-qt-xcb',
     267              ])
     268  
     269          if '~webkit' in self.spec:
     270              config_args.extend([
     271                  '-skip', 'webengine',
     272              ])
     273  
     274          configure('-no-eglfs',
     275                    '-no-directfb',
     276                    '-{0}gtk'.format('' if '+gtk' in self.spec else 'no-'),
     277                    *config_args)
```
